name: ric flair drip by offset & metro boomin | anotherblock

metadata.name: [1/500] Ric Flair Drip - Offset & Metro Boomin
metadata.description:
[1/500] BIJAN AMIR brings you RIC FLAIR DRIP that embodies a luxurious swagger by METRO BOOMIN, 21 SAVAGE and OFFSET. since its release, it amassed over one billion streams on spotify made history by being among rap caviar's five most-played songs ever, and rubber-stamped on the term "drip" into our cultural lexicon. every NFT represents 0.00075% of the music streaming rights - earn royalties alongside BIJAN AMIR when it streams.

learn more about the drop https://anotherblock.io/ric-flair-drip 

read the full contract https://anotherblock.mypinata.cloud/ipfs/QmWdnGmkpV2wKzQMEQUHAXJQxQ7YqFHAKemLp9UjAurZK2
